plot: A comedic short of a young guy who has issues getting rid of an imaginary vampire that has been following him all of his life.
title: Dimitry the Friendly Vampire
plot_es: A comedic short of a young guy who has issues getting rid of an imaginary vampire that has been following him all of his life.
plot_en: A comedic short of a young guy who has issues getting rid of an imaginary vampire that has been following him all of his life.
